196451.「おおっ やはり そちであったか！ \n 防砂ダムの上から 姿が見えたので\n:
Oh, I knew it was you! I saw you from above
the Sand Dam, so I rushed down.

196452.「……ムムッ！ その キョトンとしたカオ。\n よもや 余を忘れたというのか！？:
What's with that look? Don't tell me you've
forgotten me?<yesno><close>

196453.「共に ドワチャッカ大陸を 駆けずりまわった\n あの日々を 忘れるとは……。\:
After all our adventures across Dwachakka? No
matter. I'm a generous man so I will forgive
you!

196454.「よ…よかったぞよ。そちや ガラクタ城の皆と \n 過ごした日々は 忘れがたいで:
I'm glad to hear that. I'll never forget the
days I spent with you and everyone at Junk
Castle. But just in case, let me remind you...

196455.「余は かのガテリア皇国の 正統なる継承者\n 第一の皇子 ビャン・ダオ！:
I am Byan Dao, the rightful heir to the throne
of Gateria!

196456.「……今は ただの ビャン・ダオじゃ。\n ガテリアの遺跡で そちと別れてからは:
Since we parted ways at the ruins of Gateria,
I've been traveling all over Astoltia.

196457.「今は 縁あって ドルワーム王立研究院にて\n 失われし古代技術の研究を 手伝っ:
I am currently assisting in the research of
lost ancient technology at the Royal Research
Institute of Dolworm.

196458.「この防砂ダムは かつて ウルベア地下帝国が\n 莫大な予算をつぎ込み 建設した:
This Sand Dam was constructed by the Urbea
Empire. It was supposedly one of their largest
projects ever conceived.

196459.「ダムの向こうに広がる 広大な流砂の海には\n かの帝国の 重要な遺跡があるとい:
Beyond the dam, in the vast expanse of the Quicksand Ruins, there are said to be important ruins from the empire. I was sent to
investigate...

196460.「よりによって その遺跡の すぐ上に\n あの 奇妙な繭が 現れたのじゃ！:
But then out of nowhere, a strange cocoon
appeared in the sky over the ruins.

196461.「先に 繭が現れた グランゼドーラや\n グレンのことは 伝え聞いておるぞよ。\:
I'm worried. I heard stories of what happened
over in Glen and Gran Zedora when the cocoon
appeared.

196462.「余は リウ老師が 希望を託した\n この世界で 生きていくと決めた……。:
I have decided to live in this world in which
Master Liu has placed his hope...

196463.「老師の思いを 踏みにじらせはせぬ。 \n 余も アストルティアの未来を守るため:
If whatever is in that cocoon wants to
trample on the wishes of my master, then I
will be ready to give up my life to stop it!

196464.「余は 流砂の遺跡へ 調査に向かう。\n そちにも ぜひ 同行願いたい。:
I am on my way to Quicksand Ruins to do some
research. I hope you will accompany me.

196465.「あそこに見えるのが 防砂ダムの上に\n 移動できる 昇降機ぞよ。\n まずは:
You see that elevator over there? That's the
elevator that takes you up to the Sand Dam.
Let's head up to the top.

196467.「フフ……立派な船であろう！\n これぞ 流砂の上を自在に進む 現代に復活せし\:
Behold! This beautiful machine is a restored
Urbean "Sandship". It can traverse the
quicksand wastes with ease.

196468.「積もる話もあるが 今はさっそく \n 遺跡へ 向かうとしよう。余の 華麗なる\:
We have a lot to discuss, but let's head to
the ruins first. Just sit back and enjoy the
ride!

196469.<cs_pchero>が 砂上船に乗り込むと\nものすごいスピードで 急発進した:
<cs_pchero> got into the Sandship and it
sped off at great speed!

196470.「どうじゃ 砂上船の乗りごこちは？\n なかなかの 速度であろう。:
Well? What do you think? It is quite fast,
isn't it?

196471.「じゃが……かつて ガテリア皇国があった\n ３０００年前の ドワチャッカ大陸で:
This ship is just a small piece of what Urbea
was capable of, more than 3,000 years ago.

196472.「上空には 反重力飛行装置が飛び交い \n 都には 自動遊覧回廊が張りめぐらされ:
Anti-gravity devices, flying machines,
automated walkways so people would never have
to move on their own two feet.

196473.「できることなら そちにも あの見事な光景を\n 見せてやりたいものじゃ……。:
Were it in my power, I would loved to have
shown you the wonders of that age...

196474.「しかし まあ……\n 同じような景色ばかりが 続いておるのう。:
But now... most of the sand dunes are empty,
with not much left to see.

196475.「砂嵐の日には 巨人が現れるという\n ウワサも あるのじゃが……。:
Rumor has it that a mysterious giant appears
out on the dunes on stormy nights.

196476.「おおっ。巨人ではないが\n 我らが目指す遺跡が 見えてきたぞよ！\n さっそく:
Well, it may not be a giant, but we're coming
up on the ruins now.

196477.「ううむ……風化が はげしい。\n 見るも 無残な姿じゃ。:
It's a shame, seeing everything in ruins like
this.

196478.「栄華を誇った ウルベアの文明も \n ３０００年の月日の前には\n 何もかも:
Urbea once stood as the pinnacle of
civilization 3,000 years ago. Yet it too was
eventually swallowed by the sands of time.

196480.「３０００年の時を経て なお 動くとは！\n <cs_pchero>よ なんとか:
How do these things still have power after
3,000 years!? <pc>, do something!

196482.突然 <cs_pchero>の足元に\nヒビが入り 崩れてしまった！: Suddenly, the ground beneath you collapses!

196485.「かつて栄えた文明の 衰亡の渦中に失われし \n 地脈の結晶……それさえ手に入れ:
They say this giant was once powered by a legendary earth crystal. It was lost some time after the fall of Urbea. If only I could
get my hands on it...

196486.「滅びの未来が 訪れるのは どう考えても \n アイツが 関係してるせいだキュル:
That man is certainly involved in our
impending destruction, kyu.

196487.「アイツは この巨人が 完全な状態だった時代に \n 巨人を動かす手段を 見つけ:
If he's after a way to revive this giant, then
we should try and beat him to it, kyu.

196488.「ボクたちも この巨人を媒介にすれば \n その時代……３０５１年前に 行けるは:
This giant is strongly connected to that
time. I will use the kyube to send us back,
kyu.

196489.「あらーと あらーと。\n 速ヤカナ移動停止ヲ 命ジマス。: ALERT. ALERT. CEASE ALL MOVEMENT IMMEDIATELY.

196491.「不一致。\n 緊急対応まにゅあるニ 従ッテ\n 当該ヲ 拘束シマス。:
NO MATCH FOUND. IN ACCORDANCE WITH PROTOCOL,
SUBJECT WILL NOW BE DETAINED.

196492.「……もう よろしいでしょう。\n 離してやりなさい ０８号。: ...It should be fine. Let them go, No. 08.

196493.「私は 技術者の リウと申す者。\n あなたを拘束した 魔神機……\n ０８号ら:
My name is Liu, an engineer. I am the creator
of the Aztech machines... including No. 08 and
the others.

196494.「世間からは リウ老師と 呼ばれております。\n 良くも悪くも 知られた名ですか:
Though I assume you have already heard of me.
My name is quite well known, for better or
worse.

196495.「我らは ウルベア地下帝国に\n 捕まった 囚人……。: We are prisoners of the Urbea Empire...

196496.「先の大戦で敗れた ガテリア兵士の捕虜 \n 帝国の横暴に異をとなえた 反逆分子:
We are prisoners of war from the final
conflict between Urbea and Gateria. We've
been forced to work here ever since.

196497.「もっとも やられっぱなし……\n というわけでは ありませんがな。: Though I guess things could always be worse...

196498.「さて。０８号が あなたをスキャンした結果 \n ガテリア兵の捕虜でも ウルベア:
Well, No. 08 scanned you and found that you
are neither a prisoner of Gateria nor a
supervisor of Urbea.

196500.「……なるほど。<pc>君。 \n くわしくは話せないが あなたは 巨人を探して:
...I see. <pc>. You can't go into
specifics, but I understand you came here
looking for a giant...

196501.「なんのために そんなものを探しているのか\n 詮索は しませんが……ふむ。:
I won't pry into why you are looking for such
a thing, but... hmmm.

196502.「あなたが探している 巨人かは わかりませんが\n ウルベア地下帝国は ウルベア:
I don't know if it's the giant you're looking for, but it seems that the Urbea Empire has succeeded in developing a giant weapon called
the Urbea Colossus.

196503.「それは ウルベア地下帝国の\n 最重要機密が集う ウルベア帝国技術庁で\n 厳:
It is said that the most important secrets of
Urbea are strictly regulated by the Empire
Tech Agency.

196504.「帝国技術庁は このダラズ大鉱脈からも見える \n 防砂ダムの向こう側 流砂の海:
The Urbea Tech Agency is located in a sea of quicksand on the other side of the Sand Dam. You can see it from here, but it's not so easy
to infiltrate.

196505.「しかし…… あの方に\n 取り入ることができれば あるいは……？:
Still... this may be my chance to get through
to her...

196506.「わかりました。\n 私が <pc>君の 巨人探しに\n 協力してあげましょう。:
I understand. I will help you find the
Colossus.

196509.「不慣れな土地を旅する あなたに \n この ０８号を 案内役としてつけましょう:
No. 08 will be your guide as you move through
this unfamiliar territory. The two of you
should be able to easily infiltrate Urbea.

196510.「そして 帝国技術庁で 情報を集めてください。\n 私は この場所で 彼から転送:
And gather information at the Empire Tech
Agency. I will analyze the images and
information he transfers back to me here.

196511.「<pc>サマ。\n ツカズ離レズ オトモイタシマス。:
NICE TO MEET YOU, <pc>. LET'S DO
GREAT THINGS TOGETHER!

196513.「まずは カルデア溶岩帯を南に向かい\n ガタラ大山林から ウルベア地下帝国へ。:
First, head south through the Chaldea Lava Belt, through the Gatara Mountain Forest to the Urbea Empire. There you will meet Princess
Ulta...

196514.「帝国の主たる ウルタ皇女の信頼を 得られれば\n ウルベア大魔神への道が 開か:
Gain the trust of Princess Ulta, the current
ruler of Urbea, and you should be able to
learn more about the Colossus.

196515.「リウ老師ヨリ <pc>サマニ\n 歴史観光案内 特別ぷろぐらむヲ 提供スルヨウ:
PER MASTER LIU'S REQUEST, I WILL NOW INITIATE
TOURISM AND SIGHTSEEING PROTOCOLS. LOADING...

196516.<attr><pipipi_high><end_attr>「ガタラの丘へ ようこ:
WELCOME, TRAVELER, TO GATERIA HILL! IF YOU LOOK AT THE DESERT BELOW, YOU WILL SEE THE BLOOD STAINED SANDS WHERE THE URBEA-GATERIA
WAR REACHED ITS CONCLUSION.

196517.<attr><pipipi_high><end_attr>「ガテリア皇国と ウル:
<attr><pipipi_high><end_attr>FOR YEARS, GATERIA AND URBEA WAGED SMALL
SCALE WARS AGAINST EACH OTHER, IN A BID TO
BECOME THE DOMINANT POWER IN DWACHAKKA.

196518.<attr><pipipi_high><end_attr>「卓越した文明と技術力:
<attr><pipipi_high><end_attr>BOTH SIDES DEVELOPED GREAT AND TERRIBLE
TECHNOLOGY FOR THE SOLE PURPOSES OF WAR.
HOWEVER, THE PEOPLE GREW WEARY OF IT ALL.

196519.<attr><pipipi_high><end_attr>「一時は 停戦条約を:
BOTH SIDES ATTEMPTED TO FORGE A CEASE-FIRE. THESE NEGOTIATIONS COLLAPSED, AND IT LED TO AN ALL-OUT WAR. URBEA WAS THE VICTOR, AND GATERIA
WAS DESTROYED...

196520.「アチラガ ウルベア地下帝国ノ 入リ口デス。: THE ENTRANCE TO URBEA IS JUST AHEAD.

196522.「きゃーっ！ いやーっ！ 何すんのよぉー！: Aah! No! What are you doing!

196523.「マリッチ！ また アンタなのっ。\n まぶしいから やめてって言ったのに。:
Marich! You again? I thought I told you to
stop doing that because it's too bright!

196525.「また マリッチが めいわくビームで \n おどかして あそんでる～。:
Haha! Marich is scaring people with his beam
again!

196526.「やーい。やくたたずの ポンコツマリッチ。\n お前なんか すぐ スクラップだぞ:
You're a worthless piece of junk, Marich.
You'll be scrapped in no time!

196527.「あれって 皇女様の魔神機でしょ？ \n 毎日 なんのために やってるわけ？:
That's the Princess' robot, isn't it?
Why does it do that every day?

196528.「えてーね人ってのを 探してるんだとさ。\n でも えてーね人って なんだ？:
Apparently it's looking for something called
an "E-theen-ian"? Whatever that's supposed to
be.

196529.<pc>は\nチケットに記された 文字を読んだ。: <pc> read the text on the ticket.

196530.<center>入城許可証\n本証書を持参する者の\nウルベア帝国城への 入城を:
The holder of this ticket is hereby permitted
entry to the Urbea Empire Castle.

196531.<center>エテーネ人ノ 生体情報ト 完全ニ合致\n皇女ウルタ エテーネ人ヲ:
Your bio-information matches that of the
Etheneans. Please visit Princess Ulta as soon
as possible.

196532.「……入城許可証 入手成功！\n 城ニ 行ッテミマショウ！:
THAT SURE WAS CONVENIENT. LET'S GO TO THE
CASTLE!

196534.「わらわは徹夜じゃから 起こすなと……\n あれほど……あれほど…………: I told you... not to wake me up...

196536.「わらわが ウルベア地下帝国 第十一代皇帝\n ジャ・クバの娘 皇女ウルタである:
I am Princess Ulta, daughter of Ja Kuba, 11th
Emperor of the Urbea Empire.

196537.「そちが エテーネ人というのは まことかえ？\n ……ただの さえない冒険者に見:
Are you sure you're an Ethenean? You're just
some common adventurer...

196538.「そちが エテーネ人というのは まことかえ？\n ……どう見ても 人間には見えん:
Are you sure you're an Ethenean? You're not
even a human...

196539.「エテーネ人を探せとは 命じたが\n マリッチのサーチ精度も 信用ならぬでな。:
I ordered Marich to find me someone from
Ethene, but to be honest, I don't trust his
accuracy.

196540.「そもそも エテーネ人ともあろう者が\n この帝国に 何用で参ったのじゃ？:
So, what brings you to Urbea in the first
place?

196541.「巨人を探している……か。\n たしかに ウルベア大魔神は 我が帝国の要。:
You're looking for a giant...? It is true that
the Urbea Colossus is the keystone of our
empire.

196542.「じゃが 国賓でもない さえない冒険者に\n 案内してやるほどの 義理はないぞえ:
However, I'm not just going to show it to
every stranger that walks in and asks for a
tour.

196543.「……そちが 真にエテーネ人であることを\n 証明できれば 話は 別じゃがの。:
...unless you can prove that you are really
from Ethene.

196544.「わらわは 古代エテーネ王家に伝わる\n 時の球根なるものを 所望する。\n 持:
I desire the Time Bulb of the ancient royal
family of Ethene. Bring it to me, and I'll
believe that you're an Ethenean.

196545.「こやつ なかなか 使えそうではないか。:
What a well made piece of tech. You look
useful.

196546.「ここ数日 調整していた機材の\n 出力系統が 安定せんのでな。\n 少々 手を:
The output system of the equipment we've been
adjusting for the past few days is not stable.
I'm going to need some help.

196548.「<pc>。エテーネ王家について\n 何か 知りたいことがあるなら\n メレアー:
Time Bulb, huh? Good thing we know someone
from the Ethenean royal family, kyu.

196549.「今ごろ エテーネの村で\n 生体継続時間を 無為に浪費しているはずキュ。\n:
She's probably just wasting away her
biological continuity lazing around Ethene
Village right now. Let's go ask her, kyu.

196550.「暗証番号……なんだったかしら？\n 昔 お父様に連れられて\n 一度 入ったき:
The code... what was it? Father took me
here once a long time ago.

196551.「お父様が 自分で決めた番号だわ。\n 番号そのものは 思いだせないけど……: I don't remember Father's password, but...

196552.「たしか 『英雄レトリウスと永遠の友』っていう\n 本に書かれた数字を 順番に並:
It's a list of numbers from a book called
"Retrius and An Eternal Friend," I think! It
was my father's favorite book.

196553.「ドミネウス邸の お父様の部屋に \n あったはずなんだけど まだ 残ってるかし:
It was supposed to be in my father's room at
Domineus Mansion, but I wonder if it's still
there. It crashed...

196554.「……考えてても しかたないわよね。\n とにかく 探してみましょ <pc>！:
Well... there's nothing we can do about that.
Anyway, let's find it <pc>!

196556.「親球は 大きすぎるから……\n 持っていくなら こっちがいいと思うわ。:
The main bulb is too big to take with you, but
you can take one of its sprouts.

196557.<pc>は\nちいさな時の球根（だいじなもの）を\n手に入れた！<me 60>:
<pc> received
the Tiny Time Bulb (Key Item)!<me 60>

196558.「この球根には 王族の持つ 時渡りのチカラに\n 深く関わるという 伝承があって:
This bulb has been cherished from generation
to generation because of its legendary
connection to the royal family.

196559.「でも 誰が植えたとか どんな花が咲くとか \n くわしいことは 全然わからない:
But I have no idea who planted them or what
kind of flowers they bloom.

196560.「こんなものを ほしがる人がいるなんて\n 何のために 使うのかしら……。: I don't know why anyone would want this...

196561.「とにかく 手に入ってよかった。\n 少しは あなたの役に 立てたわよね……？:
Anyway, I'm glad we got it. I hope I was of
some use to you... was I?

196562.「せっかく エテーネに戻ってきたけど \n まるで 別の時代に 来ちゃったみたい:
I've come all the way back to Ethene, but it's
as if I've come to a different era.

196563.「本当に……もう 王宮はないのね。\n お父様も クオードも……。:
The royal manor... it really is gone, isn't
it? Father, Quard...

196564.「帰りましょう。あなたの時代に……。: Let's go home. To your time...

196565.<pc>たちは エテーネルキューブで\n現代のグランゼドーラ城下町に 戻って\n:
<pc> returned to the modern Gran
Zedora castle town with the Ethenel Cube.

196567.<pc>は 倒れたメレアーデを\nグランゼドーラ城へと 運び込んだ……。:
<pc> carried the fallen Mereade into
Gran Zedora Castle...

196568.「そちは なんと 使える魔神機じゃ。\n 素材は粗末ながら 演算処理装置は\n:
Wow! You're quite the handy little machine,
aren't you? Your model could use some work
but that's a real impressive CPU you've got.

196570.「そちを開発した 技術者の名を教えよ。\n すぐにでも 我が城で 召し抱えようぞ:
Who's the engineer that designed you? I must
have them here at the castle!

196571.「……なんじゃ 戻ってきてしもうたか。 \n このまま ０８号を ウチの子に\n:
Oh, you're back. I was hoping I'd be able to
keep No. 08 for myself. Oh well...

196572.「それで 時の球根は 手に入ったのかえ？\n さえない冒険者よ。:
So, did you get me the Time Bulb, or are you
just another phony adventurer?

196573.<pc>は ウルタ皇女に\nちいさな時の球根を 渡した。:
<pc> gave Princess Ulta the Tiny Time
Bulb.

196574.「どうやら 本物のようじゃ。\n よくぞ まあ 手に入れたものよ。:
Well well, looks like you're the real deal.
I'm surprised you were able to get
this for me.

196575.「そちが従える ０８号の性能も 見事じゃ。\n ただの さえないだけの冒険者では:
No. 08's performance has been above
expectations as well. You're clearly no
ordinary adventurer.

196576.「非礼をわびよう エテーネ人 <pc>よ。 \n よくぞ わらわの 役に立ってく:
I apologize for my rudeness. You have done me
a great service.

196577.「時渡りのチカラを 制御する秘宝。\n これさえあれば……。:
A hidden treasure that controls the power of
time travel. With this...

196578.「そちには 話してやろう。\n わらわの夢を。わらわの願いを。: I'll tell you about it. My dream, my wish.

196579.「我が父 第十一代皇帝 ジャ・クバは\n 誰よりも平和を愛し 国民の幸せを願って:
My father, the 11th Emperor Ja Kuba, loved
peace more than anyone else and wished for the
happiness of his people.

196580.「長年続いていた 西のガテリア皇国との \n 戦争に終止符を打ち 和平条約を結ぶ:
We had carefully arranged for a peace treaty
that would put an end to the long-running war
with Gateria to the west.

196581.「そんな父上の思いを 踏みにじったのが\n あの ガテリアの野蛮人じゃ……。:
But those barbarians from Gateria ruined it
all...

196582.「和平条約を結ぶ前日 きゃつは……\n 名を呼ぶのもおぞましい あの悪鬼は\n:
The day before the treaty was to be signed...
that fiend, whose name doesn't deserve to be
spoken, killed my father as he slept.

196583.「ガテリアに 和平を結ぶ気など なかった。\n 父上を油断させ はじめから ウル:
Gateria had no intentions of making peace.
They were planning to betray Urbea and my
father right from the start.

196584.「……それさえ わかっていれば \n 歴史は 変えられたものを。:
...Had we known this, things might be
different now.

196585.「わらわの願いは 時を超え 過去に戻り \n 父上の暗殺を阻止して 歴史を改変す:
My wish is to go back in time and alter
history by preventing my father's
assassination.

196586.「これは 決して 夢物語ではない。 \n 帝国技術庁で開発している アレさえ完成:
This isn't some fantasy, either. The Empire
Tech Agency has been making great
progress into a time travel device.

196587.「時渡りは そちたち エテーネ人だけのものでは\n なくなる……ということじゃな:
Soon, time travel won't be a power only you
Etheneans can take advantage of.

196588.「時の球根は 時を渡る新技術の完成に \n 不可欠なパーツの ひとつらしくてな。:
The Time Bulb is the final piece we need to
make our dream a reality. I'll bring it to
the Tech Agency now.

196589.「そちが探しているという 巨人……\n ウルベア大魔神も そこにある。\n わら:
The giant you're looking for, our experimental
Urbea Colossus, will also be there.

196590.「城内の飛行装置発着場まで 来るがよい。 \n モタモタしていると 置いてゆくぞ:
Come meet me at the landing site. Don't take
too long or I'll leave without you.

196592.「ふふ……これか？ これはのう \n ウルベア帝国式 反重力飛行装置の最新モデル:
Hehe, how do you like this? It's our latest
model Anti-Grav flying machine. Isn't she a
beauty?

196593.「新素材のフレームを 採用することで \n 機体の軽量化と 燃費の向上 および\:
The new frame material reduces weight,
improves fuel efficiency, and significantly
improves buoyancy and speed!

196594.「振動を 従来の３割以上も カットしながら \n 機関部から伝わる この熱量とパ:
30% less vibration, yet more engine output!
Not to mention this massive, hand-picked
silhouette...

196595.「ウルベアの 技術の粋を凝縮した 逸品じゃ。\n うむ！ たまらんのう！:
She's a masterpiece of Urbea technology. Mm! I
can't get enough of it!

196596.「……アア見エテ 皇女ハ 一流ノ技術者デス。 \n 代々 ウルベア地下帝国ノ 王:
IF YOU'RE WONDERING, THE PRINCESS IS A FIRST RATE ENGINEER. FOR GENERATIONS, THE ROYAL FAMILY OF URBEA HAS BEEN TRAINED IN THE ART
OF ENGINEERING.

196597.「然り。我が父上 ジャ・クバは\n あの天才技師 リウ老師に\n 手ほどきを 受:
Yes, that's right. My father, Ja Kuba was
trained by the genius Master Liu.

196598.「戦乱を前にして 決別してしまったがの。 \n 今となっては きゃつが 生きてい:
Liu left us when the war began. Even I don't
know if he's alive or dead...

196599.「それはそうと 何を ボサッとしておる？\n わらわの後ろへ 乗せてやるゆえ\n:
Well, what are you waiting for? I'll give you
a personal ride on this thing. You can thank
me later.

196600.「いざ 帝国技術庁へ……全速発進！: Now to the Empire Tech Agency... engage!

196601.「……ふん 出よったな。\n 振り落とされるなよ <pc>！:
There it is. Hang on to something. Would be
annoying if you fell off!

196602.「どーーうじゃ！\n 思い知ったか 化け物どもめ！: How was that!? Had enough, you monsters!?

196603.「わらわを あなどるでないぞよ。\n ただの 引きこもり皇女では ないわっ。\n:
Don't underestimate me. I'm not just some
shut-in princess! Ha ha ha!

196604.「おお 出迎えにきてくれたのか。\n グルヤンラシュ！: Ah, Guryan Rush! How nice of you to meet us.

196605.「エテーネ人が 現れたと聞いていたが……\n お前は 本当に ボウフラのようなヤ:
I heard an Ethenean was found, but I wasn't
expecting you. Honestly, you really are such
a bother...

196606.「時渡りができるということは お前もまた \n エテーネの血を 引く者だったのか:
If you traveled through time too, does that mean you carry the blood of Ethene? Having your power awaken when it did was really
unlucky.

196607.「おお……グルヤンラシュの 知人であったか。\n 時の球根を 手に入れられたのも:
Oh... an acquaintance of Guryan Rush. No
wonder you were able to get the Time Bulb.

196609.「俺だ。正真正銘の クオードだ。\n お互い 生きて また会えるとはな。:
It's me, Quard. I never thought I'd see you
again. In this life, at least.

196610.「……時見の神殿が 崩壊した あの日。\n 俺は 姉さんを助けだした後 無我夢中:
Back in the Timeseer Temple, when I tried to
save Mereade, my time travel powers activated
out of sheer desperation.

196611.「たどり着いたのが この ウルベア帝国だった。\n お前は つい最近 ここに来た:
I ended up here, in the Urbea Empire. You may
have arrived here only recently, but it's been
more than a decade for me...

196612.「どうだ 見違えたか？\n ずいぶん 背が伸びただろう。:
How do I look? I'm a bit taller since last
time, right?

196613.「……あの後 エテーネが どうなったのか \n この時代の文献を つぶさに調査し:
I've been doing a lot of research about what
happened to Ethene after that day. It's... not
good.

196614.「王宮が消失してから まもなく……\n エテーネ王国は 滅びを迎えたという。:
Shortly after the disappearance of the Royal
Palace... the Ethene Kingdom is destroyed.

196615.「俺は 戻らねばならない！！\n エテーネの滅びを 回避するため\n あの時代に:
I won't let that happen! I'll go back, and
I'll set everything right!

196616.「グルヤンラシュは わらわの同志。\n その上 エテーネ人の仲間が 増えるとは\:
Guryan Rush is an important ally, and a good
friend. It will be nice to have more Etheneans
on board.

196617.「俺は この帝国技術庁で ウルベアの叡智と\n エテーネの錬金術を 組み合わせた:
I intend on making a device that can master the power of time travel. With the wisdom of Urbea and the alchemy of Ethene, we shall
conquer time itself, and change the future!

196618.「ああ……グルヤンラシュというのは \n 『あの日へ帰る』という意味の 古代語で:
Ah, if you're wondering about the name, "Guryan Rush" is an ancient phrase that means "return to that day". I serve Urbea
under that name now.

196619.「ウルタ皇女は 俺の よき理解者だ。 \n 彼女となら 夢を実現できる きっと…:
Princess Ulta is my partner in this endeavor.
Together, I'll... we'll be able to fulfill our
dreams!

196620.「グルヤンラシュよ。\n さっそく 例の件を確認したい。ゆくぞ！:
Guryan Rush. I'd like to check on "that" right
away. Let's go!

196622.「また 後で会おう。\n しばらく 庁舎内を散策するといい。:
See you later. You might want to take a walk
around the area for a while.

196623.「……まさか ここに来て \n アイツと再会するとは 思わなかったキュね。:
Well, that's a surprise. I thought for sure he
would have died at the royal manor, kyu.

196624.「ああいう その時代での 影響力が強いヤツに \n 未来から来たことや メレアー:
Here's the problem. If you tell someone like
him that you're from the future, or that you
know where Mereade is, it will end badly, kyu.

196625.「クオードには 何も言うなキュ。\n <pc>が 同じ時代に飛ばされたと\n 勘:
For now, don't say anything. We're very lucky
that Quard thinks you ended up here by
accident, kyu.

196626.「さてと。ボクは しばらく眠るキュ。 \n メレアーデまで 時空転移させたことで:
Well, I'm going to sleep for a bit. Dragging
Mereade around with us earlier took a lot out
of me, kyu.

196627.「キューブの動作には 支障ないキュ。\n それでは おやすみだキュ……。:
Have fun dealing with this mess, kyu. Good
night...

196628.「<pc>サマ。\n 周辺ヲ 調査シテキマシタ。\n 重要機密ニ 関ワル 主任研:
<pc>. I HAVE DETECTED 3 PEOPLE IN
THIS FACILITY THAT HAVE THE INFORMATION WE
NEED.

196629.「３名ノ主任研究員ニ 聞キ込ミ調査ヲ 実施シ\n ダラズ大鉱脈デ待ツ リウ老師ノ:
LET'S GO COOPERATE WITH THEM AND TRY TO GET
THE DATA WE NEED FOR MASTER LIU.

196630.「むう……飛行中に やられたか？\n まったく どんくさいのう。:
Come on, Marich. How did you even get hit
mid-flight like that?

196631.「マリッチ 起きよ。 \n そんな 軟弱な子に\n 組み上げた覚えは ないぞえ。:
Wakey wakey, Marich. Come on, I don't remember
you being such a wimp.

196633.「かーっ。この ポンコツ～！！: Come on, you big pile of junk!

196635.「上空デノ戦闘ニテ 魔物ノ攻撃ヲ受ケ\n 発煙スルノヲ 確認シマシタ。:
MY ANALYSIS SHOWS THIS UNIT WAS DAMAGED WHEN
WE WERE ATTACKED BY THOSE MONSTERS.

196636.「皇女ヲ 守ルタメ 張リ切リスギタノデスネ。: THIS UNIT IS VERY DETERMINED TO KEEP YOU SAFE.

196637.「マリッチは わらわの世話係じゃ。 \n そこで 張り切るのが 仕事のようなもの:
Hmph! Don't give Marich too much praise. Its
sole purpose is to protect me.

196638.「マリッチノ めんてなんす許可ヲ 求メマス。\n ワタシニ オマカセクダサレバ…:
IF YOU'D LIKE, I CAN PERFORM PROPER
MAINTENANCE ON...

196640.「わらわは まだ 本気を出しておらぬ。\n 華麗に直してみせるゆえ 見ておれっ。:
I haven't even gotten serious yet. Just sit
back and watch how it's done!

196642.「うむ。外装こそ新しいが 素体は古い。 \n 父上に仕えた 初期型魔神機のもので:
The exterior is brand new, but the internal
circuitry is from an old machine that once
served my father.

196643.「壊れたまま 放置されていたので\n こうして 再利用することにしたのじゃ。:
It had been scrapped and left abandoned, so I
decided to reuse what I could.

196644.「取り立てて とりえのない子じゃが\n 形見と思って そばに 仕えさせておる。:
Marich can't do anything special. Still, I
keep him around as a memento of sorts.

196645.「ふん 形見などと……。\n 歴史を改変すれば 父上は\n わらわのもとへ 帰っ:
Heh, a memento... When we change the course of
history and save my father, I won't need such
things, right?

196646.「……早う 会いたいのう。: ...I'd like to see him again soon.

196647.「よし。一気に やってしまうか！: Right! Enough talk, let's get to work!

196648.ウルタ皇女は すばやい手つきで\nマリッチを 修理していった！:
Princess Ulta repaired Marich in the blink of
an eye!

196649.「なんじゃ 油くさいヤツめ。\n あまり 寄るでないっ。:
Oi, stay away from me. You're still all
greasy.

196650.「<pc> ０８号……礼を言う。\n そちたちの優しさが うれしかったぞよ。:
<pc>, No. 08. Thanks for all the help
you two have provided so far.

196651.「おお そうじゃ。見せたいものがあるゆえ\n この庁舎の最上階……４階にある\n:
Oh yeah, that reminds me. I have something I
want to show you. Come meet me on the 4th
floor when you're ready.

196652.「おかえりなさい <pc>君 ０８号。\n 遠路はるばる 呼び戻して すみません:
Welcome back, <pc>, No. 08. Sorry to
call you all the way back here.

196653.「０８号を通して 状況は把握しております。\n あなたの活躍のおかげで じつに\:
No. 08 has appraised me of the situation.
Thanks to you, we've been able to make some
very good progress.

196654.「ええ……私が 期待していた以上にね……。: Yes... much more than I expected...

196655.「あなたの その ウデを見込んで\n 今回 ウルベアに潜入してもらった\n 本当:
I wanted to tell you the real reason I asked
you to infiltrate Urbea.

196656.「私は かつて……\n ウルベア地下帝国に仕える 筆頭技術者でした。:
I was once the chief engineer in the service
of the Urbea Empire.

196657.「人々の暮らしを 豊かにしたいという \n 前皇帝ジャ・クバ陛下の 勅命を受け\:
I invented many things, including the Aztechs,
at the behest of former Emperor Ja Kuba, who
wished to enrich his people's lives.

196658.「しかし グルヤンラシュが 急速に台頭し \n 陛下のお心をとらえると 軍事技術:
However, Guryan Rush quickly gained the
emperor's favor, and shifted development
towards military technology.

196659.「私は その方針に納得できず 技術協力を断り\n ガテリアへと 亡命したのです…:
I was not satisfied with this policy, so I
refused to cooperate and defected to
Gateria...

196660.「ガテリアでは 第一皇子ビャン・ダオさまの\n 家庭教師として 教え導いておりま:
In Gateria, I was a tutor to the First Prince
Byan Dao.

196661.「あの方は じつに いい教え子でしたよ。 \n 聡明なだけでなく 心根がまっすぐ:
He was a very good student. Not only was he
bright, but he was also focused and
full of passion...

196662.「私が 亡命してから間もなく \n ウルベアから ガテリアへ\n 和平交渉の機会:
Shortly after I left, Urbea offered Gateria
the opportunity to negotiate peace.

196663.「ガテリアは 使者として\n ビャン皇子を ウルベアへ遣わしました。\n そして:
Gateria sent Prince Byan to Urbea as an
emissary. And then...

196664.「調停式の前日 ビャン皇子は\n ジャ・クバ陛下を 暗殺した…………。:
The day before the conciliation ceremony,
Prince Byan assassinated His Majesty Ja
Kuba...

196665.「……そんなわけは ないッ！: ...But I don't believe a word of it!

196666.「平和の尊さを学び よく理解してくださった\n あの方が ジャ・クバ陛下を\n:
I taught him the true value of peace! He had
no reason to even attempt something so
terrible!

196667.「私は 魔神兵を連れて ウルベア城に潜入し\n 収監された皇子を 救出しました。:
I infiltrated Urbea Castle with the Urbea
Aztech and rescued the imprisoned prince.

196668.「魔神兵の体内凍眠室に 入っていただき\n 凍眠機能を 作動させたのです。\n:
I had him enter the cryo-sleep chamber in the
Aztech's body. He will be safe until he is
reawakened.

196669.「皇子とは 未来で会う約束を しております。\n ですが……まだ 行けないのです:
I promised I would go to sleep too and meet
him in the future... but not yet.

196670.「ビャン皇子にかけられた\n 無実の罪を 晴らすまではね。:
Not until I clear his name of these false
charges.

196671.「あなたと０８号を ウルベアへ送ったのは \n 皇子が無実であるという 確たる証:
The reason I sent you and No. 08 to Urbea was
to get hard evidence that the prince was
innocent.

196672.「おかげで 予想外の手がかりを 得られました。\n ひょっとすると あの方の汚名:
Thanks to you, we have an unexpected lead.
Perhaps we can clear his name...

196673.「私は 現地に潜り込んでいる\n 協力者を頼りに 帝国技術庁へ向かいます。:
I have some contacts in the Tech Agency. They
should allow me to sneak inside.

196674.「あなたにも ぜひ 来ていただきたい。\n ビャン皇子のために どうか 頼みます:
I would like you to come too. For the sake of
Prince Byan, please, I beg you...

196675.「では 帝国技術庁の開発中枢区へ。\n ０８号は 引き続き <pc>君の\n サ:
Well then. Let's get going. I'll have No. 08
continue to assist you for the time being.

196677.「ああ お前か。ちょうどよかった。 \n ついに エテーネルキューブが……:
Ah, it's you. You're just in time. We've
finally finished the...

196678.「おひさしぶりですな グルヤンラシュ殿。: Long time no see, Guryan Rush.

196679.「……そして ウルタ皇女。\n お美しく 成長されましたな。:
...and Princess Ulta. You have grown up
beautifully, haven't you?

196681.「大罪人の脱獄に 手を貸した後 \n レジスタンスどもに かくまわれたそうだな。:
Last I heard from you, you helped the man who
murdered the king escape, and then hid with
the resistance. You dare show your face here?

196682.「……私は 皇帝ジャ・クバ暗殺の \n 真相を 解き明かしにきました。:
I have come to unravel the truth about the
assassination of Emperor Ja Kuba.

196683.「暗殺の真相じゃと……？\n 何を申すか リウ老師。:
The truth about the assassination...? What are
you saying, Master Liu?

196684.「ビャン・ダオじゃ。\n あの悪鬼が 我が父上を殺したのじゃ！:
It was that fiend Byan Dao who killed my
father!

196685.「では 確かめてみましょう。\n 誰の目にも明らかな 証拠が残っているはず。:
Really? Well, maybe we should review the
evidence.

196687.「この子は わらわの世話係 マリッチ。\n ０１号とは なんのことじゃ。:
What are you talking about. This is Marich,
not 01!

196688.「ウルベアの魔神機は 私が 生みだしたもの。\n はじめての試作機には ０１号と:
The Urbean Aztech was my invention. Your
"Marich" was the prototype, which I named 01,
and presented to His Majesty Ja Kuba.

196689.「た…たしかに この子の素体は\n 父上の側仕えをしていた 魔神機じゃが……。:
W..well...it is true that I got Marich from my
father...

196690.「０８号を通して マリッチの素体を \n 見させていただきましたよ。\n あれは:
I saw you perform maintenance while reviewing
No. 08's footage. That was my mark, no doubt
about it.

196691.「<pc>君の 協力のおかげで\n ようやく 気づくことができたのです。:
Thanks to <pc>'s help, I finally
realized it.

196692.「さあ ０１号よ。\n 調印式の前日 ジャ・クバさまの居室にて\n 記録した映像:
Now, 01. Playback the video recorded in
Ja Kuba's living room the day before the
signing ceremony.

196693.「０１号に 戦闘能力はありませんでしたが\n 皇帝の体調管理を おこなうための\:
01 did not have combat capability, but it was
equipped with a recording device to keep track
of the Emperor's physical condition.

196694.「これは ０１号がとらえ 保存し続けていた \n ジャ・クバ陛下の……最期の映像:
This is the last image of His Majesty Ja Kuba
that was captured and preserved by 01...

196695.「明日の調印式で ようやく\n ドワチャッカ大陸に 安寧の時代が訪れる。:
Tomorrow's signing ceremony will finally usher
in an era of peace in Dwachakka.

196696.「兵士たちが 尊い命を散らすことも \n 莫大な軍事予算が 民草の生活を\n む:
No more soldiers will lay down their precious
lives, and no more will the huge military
budgets plunge the people's lives into ruin...

196697.「お前たち 忠実なる魔神機たちが \n 戦場で キズつくことも なくなるのだよ。:
You and your fellow Aztech will no longer
be damaged on the battlefield, either. You've
all done so well.

196698.「ガテリアにも 平和を愛する者がいてくれた。 \n ウルタも いつか あの青年の:
Gateria's prince is someone who can see the
true value of peace. I hope Ulta grows up to
be like him.

196704.「０１号……。もし 聞こえていたら\n 愛するウルタに 伝えておくれ。:
01... if you can hear me, please tell my
beloved Ulta.

196705.「余の死を 乗り越えよ。 \n お前に ウルベアのこれからを……:
You mustn't let my death take hold of you...
For the future of Urbea...

196707.「デタラメを映す 下劣なガラクタめ。\n こんなもの 何の証拠にもならん！:
Vile machine! You show us nothing but
fabricated lies. This proves nothing!

196708.「国家転覆を目論む 反逆者どもを拘束せよ。:
Detain these traitors who seek to destroy
Urbea!

196709.「脱出不可能。\n 完全ニ 閉ジ込メラレマシタ。:
I HAVE COMPLETED MY SURVEY. THERE IS NO
WAY OUT OF HERE.

196710.「<pc>君には すまないことをしました。\n すっかり 私たちの事情に\n 巻:
I apologize for getting you caught up in this,
<pc>.

196711.「グルヤンラシュは ジャ・クバ陛下の \n ご存命中から 軍事にかたよった\n:
Guryan Rush had been pushing exclusively for
military technological pursuits since His
Majesty Ja Kuba's lifetime.

196712.「そうして 宰相として 実権を握った後は\n 平和を愛する ジャ・クバ陛下が\n:
And once the Emperor died, he must have seized
full control of the state using his new role
as chancellor.

196713.「皇帝殺しの罪を ガテリアになすりつけた上\n ウルタ皇女を孤立させ 意のままに:
He blamed Gateria for the Emperor's murder,
isolated Princess Ulta, and manipulated her to
do his bidding.

196714.「このような所業 とても 人とは思えぬ。\n 悪鬼とは 他ならぬ 奴のことですな:

dead!

196895.「これより ウルベア地下帝国\n 次期皇帝である わらわの決意を示す。\n よく:
From this moment on, I, next Empress of
the Urbea Empire, hereby proclaim.
Please listen carefully.

196896.「まず はじめに……\n ガテリア皇国 第一皇子ビャン・ダオの名誉は\n 回復さ:
First of all, let me begin by saying that the
honor of Byan Daoーthe First Prince of the
Gateria Empireーis restored.

196897.「ダラズ採掘場で 不当な労働に従事する\n ガテリアの捕虜たちも 解放させよう。:
We will also free Gateria's prisoners of war who are engaged in unjust labor in the Daraz Quarry. We will also do our utmost to help the
refugees.

196898.「また 帝国のエネルギー資源を 根本から見直し\n 砂漠化を食い止め 後の子孫た:
We will also fundamentally reexamine the empire's energy resources, halt desertification, and begin to build a truly
prosperous nation that we can be proud of for our descendants.

196899.「ゆがんだ時代を正し 思いなかばに \n 散っていった者たちが 託した未来を\n:
We will correct the distortions of the times, and accept with both hands the future entrusted to us by those who are no longer
with us...

196900.「このような悲劇を 二度と生むことのない\n 新たな時代 新たなウルベアを……\:
I hope that you will join me in building a new
era, a new Urbea, where such a tragedy will
never befall us again!

196902.「<pc>よ……。\n こたびは ウルベア地下帝国のため\n よく はたらいてく:
<pc>...you have worked hard for the
good of Urbea.

196903.「ささやかではあるが 謝礼を用意した。\n わらわの気持ちと思って 受け取ってく:
I have prepared a small reward. Please
accept it as a token of my gratitude.

196904.「そちには このまま ここに留まって\n わらわを 助けてもらいたいが……\n:
I would like you to stay here and help me, but

196905.「リウ老師には なんぞ\n 気になることが あるとか？: Is there something on your mind, Master Liu?

196906.「私の懸念は 謎の剣士に持ち去られた\n 地脈の結晶のことでございます……。:
My concern is about the Geode Crystal that was
taken away by the mysterious swordsman...

196907.「格納庫が崩落したため 今のところ\n ウルベア大魔神には 誰も 触れられません:
With the hangar collapsed, no one can touch
the Urbea Colossus for now.

196908.「しかし 地脈の結晶が どこかに存在する限り\n この先の未来において ウルベア:
But as long as the Geode Crystal exists
somewhere, there is a chance that the Colossus
could be revived in the future.

196909.「戦時中 グルヤンラシュが使役した\n ウルベア大魔神は ガテリア皇国を\n 一:
During the war, Guryan Rush used the Urbea
Colossus to destroy the empire of Gateria
in a single night...

196910.「あれこそは 高度な文明の \n 慢心が生んだ 大いなる罪の象徴。:
It is the symbol of the great sin of our
advanced civilization's pride.

196911.「私は この時代の技術者として\n 生涯をかけ ウルベア大魔神が復活した時の\n:
As an engineer of this era, I will devote my
life to developing countermeasures against the
resurrection of the Urbea Colossus.

196912.「うむ……頼んだぞ リウ老師よ。\n わらわも 全力で支援すると 約束しよう。:
Yes... I'm counting on you, Master Liu. I
promise you that I will do my best to support
you.

196913.「<pc>君に 渡したいものがあります。\n これは 対抗策が完成したことを\n:
I have something I want to give you, . This is a detector that will let you know when the countermeasure is
complete...

196914.「……私は 確信しております。 \n あなたならば きっと 役立ててくれると。\:
I'm sure that it will come in handy. Please
take it.

196915.<pc>は リウ老師から\nリウ老師の探知機（だいじなもの）を\n受け取った！<:
<pc> received
Master Liu's Locator (Key Item) from Master
Liu!<me 60>

196916.「以上デ <pc>サマヘノ\n さぽーと任務ハ スベテ 終了。\n ゴ利用 アリ:
THIS CONCLUDES OUR MISSION. THANK YOU FOR
YOUR ASSISTANCE, <pc>.

196917.「……名残惜シイデス <pc>サマ。\n アナタトノ 旅ノ思イ出ハ\n イツマデ:
I'LL MISS YOU. I WILL ALWAYS REMEMBER THE
TIME WE SPENT TOGETHER.

196918.「<pc>……\n ウルベアを救った エテーネ人の英雄よ。\n わらわは そちの:
<pc>... the Ethenean hero who
saved Urbea. I will never forget you!

196919.「快眠 快眠っキュ。: That was a good nap, kyu.

196920.「だいぶ チカラが回復したキュル。\n <pc> 状況報告を 要請するキュ。:
I've recovered most of my strength. Why don't
you tell me everything you were up to, kyu.

196921.「そんな状況なのに まだ この時代に\n とどまってるつもりキュ？\n 何をすべ:
Then what are we still doing here? You know
what we have to do, kyu.

196922.「こうしてるうちに 黒衣の剣士が 現代で \n 大魔神を起動させてるに 決まって:
While we're here, the Dark Swordsman must be
activating the Colossus in the present. Hurry

196923.「ややっ 来るぞ……。\n 総員 戦闘配置に つけーーいッ！:
Oh no, here it comes... all hands to battle

196924.「きょ…巨人だ！\n とんでもなくデカい 化け物だー！！: It's a giant! It's a huge monster!

196926.「大砲の弾が はじかれます！\n 奴は 鉄壁のバリアを 展開していますッ！:
The cannonballs are being repelled! It's
deployed some kind of barrier!

196927.「あれは たしかに ウルベア大魔神！\n ひとにらみで 大地を焦土と化し\n 我:
That is indeed the Urbea Colossus! With a single glance, he scorched the earth and destroyed our homeland with the worst weapon
in history...

196928.「あんなものに 立ち向かうすべなど ない。\n 今度こそ 余も リウ老師のもとへ:
There is no way we can stand up to that thing.
Is today the day I see Master Liu again?

196929.「なんと <cs_pchero>か！ そなたなら\n 必ず 生きていると 信じて:
Oh, <cs_pchero>! I knew that you were

196930.「だが 再会のよろこびも あの大魔神の前では \n すべて むなしい……か。:
But all the joys of reunion are hollow in the

196931.「リウ老師が遺した 大魔神への対抗策じゃと！？:
Master Liu made a countermeasure against the

196932.「おおぉお……リウ老師……ッ。\n こうしてまた そなたに 教え導かれるとは。:
Ohhh, Master Liu... I never thought that I

196933.「そうであったな……。\n 余は この時代を守ると 決めたのじゃ。\n 生きてお:
That's right... I have decided to protect this
era. As long as I live, I will resist with all
my might!

196934.「砲撃準備。至急 太陽の弾を装填せよ！\n 目標 眼前に迫る ウルベア大魔神ッ！:
Prepare to fire. Load the Sunshot

196936.「バリアの消失を 確認！\n 効いてます！ 効いてますよッ！！:
The barrier is gone! It's working! It's

196937.「しかし こちらへ 向かってきます。\n ビャン殿 どうしますかッ！？:
But it's still coming this way. Mr. Byan, what

196938.「強敵相手に きびしい戦いになるが……\n 我らも 全力で 援護射撃をするゆえ\:
It will be a tough fight against a strong
enemy, but we will do our best to cover you...
We're all counting on you!

196939.「奴のバリアは 打ち破った！\n 我らも 援護射撃をするゆえ\n <cs_pch:
His barrier has been breached! We too will

196940.「やったぞ！ 我らは ついに\n ウルベア大魔神を 打ち滅ぼしたのじゃ！:
We did it! We have finally vanquished the

196941.「３０００年の時を超えて リウ老師が\n 余を 守ってくれたのじゃな……。:
Even after 3,000 years, Master Liu has

196942.「ガテリアの弔い合戦を 果たせたこと\n そちには 感謝してもしきれぬぞよ。:
I can't thank you enough for helping to bring

196943.「<cs_pchero>……\n そちは まさに ドワチャッカ大陸の英雄じゃ！:
<cs_pchero>... you truly are the hero of

196944.「おおっ こうしては おれんぞよ。\n 急ぎ ドルワーム王国へと戻り 報告せねば:

196945.「これより 流砂の海に沈んだ\n ウルベア大魔神の 引き上げを開始する。\n 本:
We will now begin salvaging the Urbea

196947.「邪魔してもらっては 困るな 雑兵ども。: Stay out of my way, scavengers.

196949.「時の異分子よ。\n 今度こそ 貴様との因縁……:
You have grown from a small pest into a

196951.「<cs_pchero> <cs_pchero>。今の状態で\n アイツと戦うの:
<cs_pchero>! I shouldn't have to tell

VERY bad idea, kyuru! Let's run, kyu!

196952.「わかった わかったキュ……。 \n キミが 融通のきかない 非効率な思考回路を:
I get it, I get it...
I already know that your thought process
says you won't listen to what I say, kyu.

196953.「ただし 今ここで <cs_pchero>に死なれると\n ボクとしても それな:
If you fight that guy right now, he will kill

196954.「せめて 態勢をととのえて 出直すキュ！:
If you really want to die, at least prepare

196958.<center>再三にわたり 我が眷属を倒す 戦闘能力。\n強大な 時渡りの能力:
Again and again, you have attempted to ruin

196959.<center>そこなる 欠損品と同等以上の\n性能を 有していそうではあるが…:
You would make an excellent puppet. Far better

196960.<center>究極へと至るまで あと少し……。\n今しばらくは 我が傀儡として:
However, perfection is almost within my

197200.<cs_pchero>は これまでのことを\n報告するため 賢者ルシェンダの待つ:
<cs_pchero> went to Gran Zedora Castle,

197285.<pc>たちは エレベーターに乗せられ\n第３０２開発室に 連行されてしまった…:
<pc> was put in the elevator and

199756.「いよいよ ここまで来ました。 \n 完成すれば ついに 我々の願いがかなう……:

199757.「……グルヤンラシュ 礼を言うぞ。\n そちがいなければ わらわは\n とうの昔:
None of this would have been possible without

199758.「父上が暗殺され 絶望したわらわに \n 過去はやり直せる 歴史は変えられる……:

199759.「私も同じです 皇女。\n あなたが 私の言葉を 信じてくれたから\n ここまで:

199760.「うむ よくぞ参った <pc>よ。\n 見せたいものとは これじゃ。:

199763.「ひとつ目の素材は アルケミダスト。\n 高位錬金術の 副産物として生成され\n:

199764.「この時代で 優秀な錬金術師と出会い \n 配下につけることができたのは 幸運だ:

199765.「ふたつ目の素材は 時の球根。\n 時渡りのチカラを キューブに定着させ\n 安:

199766.「こちらも 錬金術で作りだした代用品で\n 間に合わせる 予定だったのだが……:

199768.「……そして 最後が ボロヌジウム。 \n 時渡りのチカラと 莫大なエネルギーを:

199769.「ガテリア皇国領地 ボロヌス溶岩流地帯の\n 地底から採掘される 希少な鉱物資源:
It's a rare mineral mined from the Boronus Lava Flow in Gateria. It has natural magical properties, and is the only thing strong

199770.「ガテリアが 国の宝とした ボロヌジウムを\n 我らウルベアに ゆずるはずもない:

199772.「…………だが 本当に そうだったのか？: ...Still, was there really no other way?

199773.「果たして あれが 正しい選択だったのか\n 今でも わらわは…………。:

199775.「前皇帝ジャ・クバ様。\n あなたのお父上を 殺したのは…………:

199776.「ガテリア皇国 第一の皇子\n 悪鬼ビャン・ダオ……なのですから。: ...was the First Prince of Gateria, Byan Dao.

199778.「生真面目な性質と 情熱的な姿勢を \n 皇帝は 気に入っておられたのに……\n:
The emperor was entranced by his calm and

199779.「調印式の前日 ビャン・ダオは\n 油断した皇帝の 私室に忍び込み\n その 尊:
On the eve of the signing ceremony, Byan Dao

199781.「ですが ご安心ください。 \n 歴史は やり直すことが できるのですから。: Don't worry. The past can be rewritten.

199783.「エテーネルキューブの 完成を急げ。: We must hurry and finish the Ethenel Cube.

199784.「そちは 自分の故国に戻るため。 \n わらわは 父上の悲劇を 止めるため。:
You'll return to your homeland, and I'll save

199786.「さて……。\n お前が とんだ お人好しということは\n 重々 知っている。:
Now... I know it's in your nature to help

199787.「だが それだけのために 時の球根を\n 手に入れてくるとは 思えない。\n 何:

199788.「共に エテーネ王国へ戻ることか？\n なんでも 話してくれ。 \n 俺にできる:

199789.<pc>は クオードに\nウルベア大魔神が狙われていることを 話した。:
<pc> told Quard that the Urbea

199790.「大魔神が 敵に狙われている？\n それを 守りにきた……？:

199791.「たとえ 敵に狙われていたとしても\n この帝国技術庁ほど 守りに適した場所はな:

199792.「だが……知らせてくれて 感謝する。\n 大船に乗ったつもりで 後は まかせてお:

199793.「リウ老師ヨリ 音声通話ノ要請アリ。\n 会話ヲ許可。接続イタシマス………………:
MASTER LIU REQUESTS A VOICE CALL. CONNECTING
NOW...

199794.「……聞こえますかな <pc>君。\n 長旅 ご苦労さまでした。:
...Can you hear me, <pc>? Thank

199795.「おかげで 重要な情報が 入手できました。\n 一度 ダラズ大鉱脈の管理事務所ま:
Thanks to you, we have important information.
Could you please come back to the management
office in the Daraz Prospect?

199796.「とても 大事な話があるのです。\n よろしく 頼みましたぞ……。:
I have something very important to tell you.
I'm counting on you...

203554.「おお……どうやら 無事のようじゃな！\n 今 助けを呼んでくるぞよ！:
Oh... looks like you're all right! I'm gonna

203555.<pc>は ウルベア魔神兵に\nどこかの部屋へと 連れていかれた……。:
<pc> was taken by the Urbea Aztech
to a room somewhere...

203557.城に戻った ウルタ皇女は 家臣たちに\nこれまでの真相を すべて話した。:
Returning to the castle, Princess Ulta told

203558.特に 皇帝を暗殺した グルヤンラシュを\n皇女の手で 断罪した件は\n大きな衝撃:
In particular, the execution of Guryan Rush, the Emperor's true killer, at the hands of the princess, caused a huge uproar and unrest in
the castle...

203559.「地脈エネルギーへの対抗策……\n おそらく 太陽エネルギーに その可能性が\n:
Perhaps solar energy has potential as a

203822.<pc>は 皇女の魔神機を探して\n広場の周辺を 歩いてまわった。:
<pc> walked around the perimeter of

Mech.
